page.title: 09MODERN FACILITIES FOR HEALTH
page.content: Modern health facilities and their importance in a village community is essential as there is no hospital in the area. The nearest one is four miles away in Milton Keynes. Two doctors' surgeries are available to inhabitants, one in Woburn Sands and the other in Cranfield, likewise the nearest chemist for obtaining medical requirements and prescriptions. Some incapacitated and elderly people are visited by social workers and home helps. The District Nurse for the area is based in Cranfield. There are a few people who need wheel chairs and walking frames but on the whole health is fairly good in this district. People do get colds, influenza, high blood pressure and rheumatism. The nearest dental surgery is in Woburn Sands, so is the osteopath. Health shops are in Milton Keynes & Bedford.
